object.name: TransactionPartnerUser
object.description: Describes a transaction with a user.
object.rst_description: Describes a transaction with a user.

annotations.description: Type of the transaction partner, always 'user'
annotations.rst_description: Type of the transaction partner, always 'user'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the affiliate that received a commission via this transaction
annotations.name: affiliate

annotations.description: The duration of the paid subscription
annotations.html_description: Optional. The duration of the paid subscription
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The duration of the paid subscription
annotations.name: subscription_period

annotations.description: Information about the paid media bought by the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. Information about the paid media bought by the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Information about the paid media bought by the user
annotations.name: paid_media

annotations.description: The gift sent to the user by the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. The gift sent to the user by the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The gift sent to the user by the bot
annotations.name: gift
